name: untranslated
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not having been translated (= changed into a different language): The court would send them untranslated letters full of complicated legal jargon. His early, untranslated novels were family sagas, modelled on Dostoevsky and Tolstoy. Related words
untranslatable
untranslatability
More examplesFewer examplesPublished in 1988, and still untranslated, it is a vivid, moving account of the period.Some of the works cited remain untranslated, at least for the moment.I seem to be unable to read an untranslated text with any degree of confidence.
